passwordReset.subject: Password Reset Request - Zentik
passwordReset.title: Password Reset Request
passwordReset.description: You requested a password reset for your Zentik account.
passwordReset.codeInstructions: Use the following 6-character code to reset your password:
passwordReset.instructions1: Enter this 6-character code in the password reset form in the Zentik app
passwordReset.instructions2: This code will expire in 24 hours
passwordReset.instructions3: If you didn't request this reset, please ignore this email

welcome.subject: Welcome to Zentik!
welcome.title: Welcome to Zentik, {{username}}!
welcome.description: Thank you for registering with Zentik. We're excited to have you on board!
welcome.instructions: You can now start managing your notifications and buckets.

confirmation.subject: Confirm Your Email - Zentik
confirmation.title: Email Confirmation
confirmation.description: Please confirm your email address to complete your Zentik registration.
confirmation.codeInstructions: Use the following confirmation code to verify your email:
confirmation.instructions1: Enter this confirmation code in the Zentik app to verify your email
confirmation.instructions2: This code will expire in 24 hours

tokenRequestApproved.subject: System Access Token Request Approved - Zentik
tokenRequestApproved.title: Token Request Approved
tokenRequestApproved.description: Your system access token request has been approved.
tokenRequestApproved.instructions: You can now use your token to access the system API. Make sure to save it securely as it will not be shown again.
tokenRequestApproved.selfServiceLink: View your token requests in the self-service portal

tokenRequestDeclined.subject: System Access Token Request Declined - Zentik
tokenRequestDeclined.title: Token Request Declined
tokenRequestDeclined.description: Your system access token request has been declined.
tokenRequestDeclined.instructions: If you have questions about this decision, please contact the administrator.
tokenRequestDeclined.selfServiceLink: View your token requests in the self-service portal
